data.title: Blum Wealth Management Group of Wells Fargo Advisors
data.meta_description: With over 20 years of experience our multigenerational team works with you to create customized planning and investment strategies to help you and your family maintain the type of lifestyle to which you have become accustomed and to help you reach the goals you have for your future.
data.meta_site_name: Blum Wealth Management of Wells Fargo Advisors
data.text:
“While each client relationship is unique, our motivation is the same– ensure everyone has confidence they are on track to achieve their goals.” – Lan Ngo

Background & Experience

Lan has an extensive background in the financial services industry having been an Institutional Consulting Analyst and relationship manager for ultra-high net worth family offices, endowments and foundations.

Lan graduated from California State University Long Beach in 1994 with an undergraduate degree in Finance and an MBA in 1996. Lan received her Certified Investment Management Analyst (CIMA) certification in 2009 from Wharton Business School, a program in conjunction with IMCA. Lan also currently holds the Series 7 and Series 66 securities licenses.

With a career spanning over two decades, Lan started in the financial services industry with Dean Witter in 1994 while in college and has amassed a wealth of knowledge over the years. In 2003, Lan transitioned to Smith Barney as a Consulting Group Analyst, a predecessor firm of Morgan Stanley. In 2009, Lan left Morgan Stanley and took a 6-year hiatus from the business due to health reasons.

In 2015, Lan returned to Morgan Stanley as an Institutional Consulting Analyst overseeing all aspects of performance reporting and Requests for Proposals (RFPs) for a team of financial advisors in Long Beach. In this role, Lan gained an extensive background in the private markets business working with private equity managers and fund administrators. While at Morgan Stanley, Lan was also a relationship manager for institutional clients serving endowments and foundations as well as family offices.

Lan recently joined Blum Wealth Management Group of Wells Fargo Advisors in 2023 serving private clients. In this client liaison role overseeing the daily operations of the business, Lan is excited for the opportunity to apply her extensive background and experience and help the team expand in the years to come.

Away From the Office

In 2012, Lan was a certified tai chi instructor with Compassionate Services Society, a non-profit organization in Southern California. Having been a cancer survivor, it was Lan’s way of giving back and briefly served her community for a year.
